long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate predicted scores when watching live football live football on tv:

Welcome to the live football on tv Chrome app! This application helps you as a troll application to give random scores of matches like Chaco For Ever - Defensa y Justicia, Spain - Scotland, Netherlands - France, England - Australia, and many other matches.

Setting :

Open Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "live football on tv" in the search box. livesport365.live
Select the "live football on tv" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:

Select the match you want to see fun predictions for from the list of available matches.
